data.what_is:
Convertedin is a marketing operating system for e-commerce, which utilizes data and shoppers' insights to create personalized multi-channel marketing that boosts customer engagement and maximizes ROI.


Scale Your Campaigns Using Ad Automation

Run, scale, and automate your advertising campaigns on five different platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, and Google)

Send Targeted Campaigns Using SMS & Email Automation

Utilize your customers' data to send highly personalized campaigns; that drive conversions and sales for your business.

Connect Your Store Using Catalog Intelligence 

Import all your e-commerce store products and categorize them into customizable sets to be able to launch dynamic campaigns using them.

AI-Powered Segmentation

Segment your customers based on their shopping behavior into highly detailed segments that you could easily use in your marketing campaigns.

24/7 Support

If you need support or advice, we will be there for you. Our team is available 24 hours a day.
data.product_description: Convertedin is a marketing operating system for e-commerce, which utilizes data and shoppers' insights to create personalized multi-channel marketing that boosts customer engagement and maximizes ROI.All-in-One Solution: Convertedin combines everything you need for e-commerce marketing in a single dashboard, making it easy to manage.Smart Targeting: Our AI-driven segmentation helps you reach the right customers, increasing engagement and sales.Wider Reach: Run ads across different platforms to expand your audience and boost revenue.Personal Touch: Use personalized messaging to connect with customers, driving loyalty and higher returns.Focused Growth: Convertedin is designed to increase your sales, ROI, and revenue, giving you a competitive edge.Effortless Management: Our dashboard simplifies campaign control, making it simple to make informed decisions and get better results.

plan_features: Free for your first $500 revenues through Convertedin
Single social media ads platform (Facebook | Instagram)
Multi social media ads platforms including (Tiktok, Snapchat)

pricing_plans.plan_description: Tailored solution, that is a perfect fit for your business needs.
plan_features: Multi social media ads platforms including (Twitter)
Export analytics to Tableau / Power BI
Integrations (Mobile app SDK, Zapier, Loyalty, CRM)

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: As reported in 14 Convertedin reviews. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: As reported in 15 Convertedin reviews. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 10 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 13 Convertedin reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. This feature was mentioned in 13 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 13 Convertedin reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies. This feature was mentioned in 10 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.  This feature was mentioned in 12 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 14 Convertedin reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 11 Convertedin reviews. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 13 Convertedin reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 14 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores 14 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. This feature was mentioned in 13 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. This feature was mentioned in 11 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information. This feature was mentioned in 15 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization. 10 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: As reported in 13 Convertedin reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 11 Convertedin reviews. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 11 Convertedin reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. 13 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions. 11 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: As reported in 15 Convertedin reviews. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. 12 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time This feature was mentioned in 15 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. 13 reviewers of Convertedin have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. This feature was mentioned in 11 Convertedin reviews.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 14 Convertedin reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline. This feature was mentioned in 12 Convertedin reviews.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Convertedin?
The user interface is incredibly user-friendly, making it easy for even non-technical team members to navigate and utilize its features effectively. This helps in onboarding new team members quickly.

What do you dislike about Convertedin?
There is no mobile app for Convertedin, which can be inconvenient for users who want to access the software on the go. However, the web-based interface is very mobile-friendly, so it is still possible to use Convertedin on a smartphone or tablet.

What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
I've been using Convertedin for a while now, and it has become an invaluable tool in my marketing arsenal. What I like best about Convertedin is its seamless integration of various marketing automation features. It simplifies and streamlines so many aspects of our marketing campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Convertedin?
review_question_answers.answer: The user interface is incredibly user-friendly, making it easy for even non-technical team members to navigate and utilize its features effectively. This helps in onboarding new team members quickly.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Convertedin?
review_question_answers.answer: There is no mobile app for Convertedin, which can be inconvenient for users who want to access the software on the go. However, the web-based interface is very mobile-friendly, so it is still possible to use Convertedin on a smartphone or tablet.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I've been using Convertedin for a while now, and it has become an invaluable tool in my marketing arsenal. What I like best about Convertedin is its seamless integration of various marketing automation features. It simplifies and streamlines so many aspects of our marketing campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: Convertedin:Powerful Platform and Automated Marketing, Delivering Outstanding ROAS
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Convertedin?
I have access to a multitude of features that greatly enhance the effectiveness of my social media campaigns. Navigating and using the tool is a breeze thanks to its user-friendly interface. I can effortlessly create new segments by leveraging the diverse attributes and parameters provided by ConvertedIn, simplifying the process of segmentation. The custom reports feature is a valuable resource, giving me comprehensive insights into the performance of my campaigns. With the campaign dashboard, I can easily stay informed about the real-time progress and results of my campaigns.

What do you dislike about Convertedin?
Up until now, there have been no issues. Everything is functioning perfectly!

What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
The quick AI audience creation has been a game-changer for improving how I target my campaigns effectively.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Convertedin?
review_question_answers.answer: I have access to a multitude of features that greatly enhance the effectiveness of my social media campaigns. Navigating and using the tool is a breeze thanks to its user-friendly interface. I can effortlessly create new segments by leveraging the diverse attributes and parameters provided by ConvertedIn, simplifying the process of segmentation. The custom reports feature is a valuable resource, giving me comprehensive insights into the performance of my campaigns. With the campaign dashboard, I can easily stay informed about the real-time progress and results of my campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Convertedin?
review_question_answers.answer: Up until now, there have been no issues. Everything is functioning perfectly!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The quick AI audience creation has been a game-changer for improving how I target my campaigns effectively.

initial_reviews.review_title: Convertedin is a great Paid Ads Management Partner based here in the Saudi Arabia
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Convertedin?
Teaming up with Convertedin has brought us better results in terms of ad campaign costs and lead quality. Thanks to their know-how, we're reaching our marketing targets more effectively. Their work on refining the cost per lead and lead assessment has really boosted our campaign's overall success. We're now getting more valuable leads who are genuinely interested in what we offer.

What do you dislike about Convertedin?
I currently don't have any updates. I consistently urge Convertedin to maintain their honesty, even if it means delivering not-so-positive updates.

What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
Convertedin has truly impressed us. It's behind the impressive rise in potential customers through smart social media marketing, a noticeable bump in website visitors, and some seriously persuasive copywriting. Opting for Convertedin wasn't just a choice; it was a smart move that's making our marketing decisions easier. This special platform links us with customers who really want our products, helping us make more sales and keep our customers loyal. Making customers happy is the secret to our success, and Convertedin helps us do just that.

review_question_answers.answer: Teaming up with Convertedin has brought us better results in terms of ad campaign costs and lead quality. Thanks to their know-how, we're reaching our marketing targets more effectively. Their work on refining the cost per lead and lead assessment has really boosted our campaign's overall success. We're now getting more valuable leads who are genuinely interested in what we offer.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Convertedin?
review_question_answers.answer: I currently don't have any updates. I consistently urge Convertedin to maintain their honesty, even if it means delivering not-so-positive updates.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Convertedin has truly impressed us. It's behind the impressive rise in potential customers through smart social media marketing, a noticeable bump in website visitors, and some seriously persuasive copywriting. Opting for Convertedin wasn't just a choice; it was a smart move that's making our marketing decisions easier. This special platform links us with customers who really want our products, helping us make more sales and keep our customers loyal. Making customers happy is the secret to our success, and Convertedin helps us do just that.

initial_reviews.review_title: ConvertedIn: The Ultimate E-commerce Solution for Driving Sales and Growing Your Business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Convertedin?
ConvertedIn is to help businesses optimize their e-commerce sales, improve the user experience, and grow their customer base through targeted and personalized marketing strategies.

What do you dislike about Convertedin?
ConvertedIn can be relatively expensive, with plans starting at $99 per month. This may not be feasible for small businesses or those with limited budgets.

all_reviews.review_title: Convertedin is a great Paid Ads Management Partner based here in the Saudi Arabia
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Convertedin?
Teaming up with Convertedin has brought us better results in terms of ad campaign costs and lead quality. Thanks to their know-how, we're reaching our marketing targets more effectively. Their work on refining the cost per lead and lead assessment has really boosted our campaign's overall success. We're now getting more valuable leads who are genuinely interested in what we offer.

What do you dislike about Convertedin?
I currently don't have any updates. I consistently urge Convertedin to maintain their honesty, even if it means delivering not-so-positive updates.

What problems is Convertedin solving and how is that benefiting you?
Convertedin has truly impressed us. It's behind the impressive rise in potential customers through smart social media marketing, a noticeable bump in website visitors, and some seriously persuasive copywriting. Opting for Convertedin wasn't just a choice; it was a smart move that's making our marketing decisions easier. This special platform links us with customers who really want our products, helping us make more sales and keep our customers loyal. Making customers happy is the secret to our success, and Convertedin helps us do just that.
